[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/context](./context.md) &gt; [ContextObserver](./context.contextobserver.md) &gt; [filter](./context.contextobserver.filter.md)

## ContextObserver.filter property

An optional filter function to match bindings. If not present, the listener will be notified of all binding events.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filter?: BindingFilter;
```
